trans-unit.source: Create a WordPress web app in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Create a WordPress web app in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: A tutorial that teaches you how to create a new Azure web app for a WordPress blog, and then deploy it through the Azure Preview Portal.
trans-unit.target: A tutorial that teaches you how to create a new Azure web app for a WordPress blog, and then deploy it through the Azure Preview Portal.

trans-unit.source: Create a WordPress web app in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Create a WordPress web app in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: You've seen how to create and deploy a web app from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: You've seen how to create and deploy a web app from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: To learn more about how to create, configure, deploy, and scale Azure web apps, check out these resources:
trans-unit.target: To learn more about how to create, configure, deploy, and scale Azure web apps, check out these resources:

trans-unit.source: [Create a PHP-MySQL Azure web app and deploy using Git](/en-us/develop/php/tutorials/website-w-mysql-and-git/) -- Create an PHP web app from scratch and deploy it to Azure App Service using Git
trans-unit.target: [Create a PHP-MySQL Azure web app and deploy using Git](/en-us/develop/php/tutorials/website-w-mysql-and-git/) -- Create an PHP web app from scratch and deploy it to Azure App Service using Git

trans-unit.source: [More PHP tutorials](/en-us/develop/php/tutorials/) - Create additional types of applications using PHP and Azure
trans-unit.target: [More PHP tutorials](/en-us/develop/php/tutorials/) - Create additional types of applications using PHP and Azure

trans-unit.source: For a guide to the change from Websites to App Service see: [Azure App Service and Its Impact on Existing Azure Services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714)
trans-unit.target: For a guide to the change from Websites to App Service see: [Azure App Service and Its Impact on Existing Azure Services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714)

trans-unit.source: For a guide to the change of the old portal to the new portal see: [Reference for navigating the preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715)
trans-unit.target: For a guide to the change of the old portal to the new portal see: [Reference for navigating the preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715)
